title: hbase
content: hbaseshell命令1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132#进入hbase$HBASE_HOME/bin/hbase shell#查看所有表list#查看表结构 （查出的NAME为列族）describe 'tbl_user'# 扫描整个列簇的某个列scan '表名', {COLUMN=>'列族名:列名'}# 示例scan 'tbl_user', {COLUMN=>'info:age'}#limitscan 'tbl_user', {COLUMN=>'info:age', LIMIT => 200 }#rowscan 'tbl_user',{COLUMN=>'nt:tp',STARTROW=>'0',ENDROW=>'000014143575206-0',LIMIT=>100}#正倒序can 'tbl_user',{COLUMN=>'nt:tp',STARTROW=>'0',ENDROW=>'000014143575206-0',LIMIT=>100,REVERSED => TRUE}#获取指定rowget 'table','rowKey'get 'tbl_user','8327787466-af988005'
